mapper.sql: id, dingdan_date, dingdan_zhucai, dingdan_qingcai, dingdan_peicai, dingdan_tangshui, dingdan_user, dingdan_jiage
mapper.insert: insert into dingdan (dingdan_date, dingdan_zhucai, dingdan_qingcai, dingdan_peicai, dingdan_tangshui, dingdan_user, dingdan_jiage, dingdan_jialaFlag , dingdan_createtime) values (#{dingdanDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{dingdanZhucai,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dingdanQingcai,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dingdanPeicai,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dingdanTangshui,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dingdanUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dingdanJiage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jialaFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} , date_format(NOW(),'%H:%i:%s'))

insert into dingdan
dingdan_date,
dingdan_zhucai,
dingdan_qingcai,
dingdan_peicai,
dingdan_tangshui,
dingdan_user,
dingdan_jiage,
#{dingdanDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{dingdanZhucai,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dingdanQingcai,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dingdanPeicai,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dingdanTangshui,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dingdanUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dingdanJiage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update dingdan
dingdan_date = #{dingdanDate,jdbcType=DATE},
dingdan_zhucai = #{dingdanZhucai,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dingdan_qingcai = #{dingdanQingcai,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dingdan_peicai = #{dingdanPeicai,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dingdan_tangshui = #{dingdanTangshui,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dingdan_user = #{dingdanUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dingdan_jiage = #{dingdanJiage,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update dingdan set dingdan_date = #{dingdanDate,jdbcType=DATE}, dingdan_zhucai = #{dingdanZhucai,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dingdan_qingcai = #{dingdanQingcai,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dingdan_peicai = #{dingdanPeicai,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dingdan_tangshui = #{dingdanTangshui,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dingdan_user = #{dingdanUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dingdan_jiage = #{dingdanJiage,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select di.id, di.dingdan_date, di.dingdan_zhucai, di.dingdan_qingcai, di.dingdan_peicai, di.dingdan_tangshui, di.dingdan_user, di.dingdan_jiage, (SELECT concat(z.name,' ',z.jiage,'元') from zhucai z where z.id = di.dingdan_zhucai) zhucaiName, (SELECT q.name from qingcai q where q.id = di.dingdan_qingcai) qingcaiName, (SELECT p.name from peicai p where p.id = di.dingdan_peicai) peicaiName, (SELECT concat(t.name,' ',t.jiage,'元') from tangshui t where t.id = di.dingdan_tangshui) tangshuiName, di.dingdan_jialaFlag from dingdan di where di.dingdan_user = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and di.dingdan_date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}

select di.id, (select u.name from user u where di.dingdan_user = u.id) dingdan_user_name, di.dingdan_date, di.dingdan_zhucai, di.dingdan_qingcai, di.dingdan_peicai, di.dingdan_tangshui, di.dingdan_user, di.dingdan_jiage, di.dingdan_createtime , (SELECT concat(z.name,' ',z.jiage,'元') from zhucai z where z.id = di.dingdan_zhucai) zhucaiName, (SELECT q.name from qingcai q where q.id = di.dingdan_qingcai) qingcaiName, (SELECT p.name from peicai p where p.id = di.dingdan_peicai) peicaiName, (SELECT concat(t.name,' ',t.jiage,'元') from tangshui t where t.id = di.dingdan_tangshui) tangshuiName from dingdan di where di.dingdan_date = CURDATE()
select code_val from xumama_code xc where code_key = 'isLock'
mapper.update: UPDATE xumama_code set code_val = #{isLock} where code_key = 'isLock'
